content:
Hello!
I’m wondering what to do if someone politely says they’re not interested and don’t hang up? Do I continue on to the next part of the script or just nicely thank them and hang up? Then do I hit the refuse button for the call or something else?

Thank you!
Hit refuse on page 1 and end the call with a polite thank you, have a nice day!

Perfect thank you! So just double checking, don’t try to continue the conversation? I just thanked him for his time but wasn’t sure after if I should’ve pushed onto conversation since he was very nice

No I wouldn't push it but you can offer some polite banter and see if it opens them up to talk.  Something like "I know you are getting a lot of calls so thank you so much for even answering.  I'm calling from the  Harris Walz campaign and I appreciate your time" or any variation!
